entry.name: Dell_DRAC_PCICardStatusScript
entry.description: status of pci card for iDRAC7 and newer that supports SNMP

attribute.name: scriptgroovy

datapoint.name: PCIDeviceStatus
datapoint.alertbody:
The DRAC on ##HOST## is reporting a status code of ##VALUE## for PCI device ##INSTANCE##, which puts this device in ##LEVEL## state. This started at ##START## - or ##DURATION## ago.
DRAC component status codes are as follows: 1: other - status is not one of the following 2: unknown - status unknown (possibly not monitored) 3: ok - normal operation 4: nonCritical - warning 5: critical - component failure 6: nonRecoverable - component is dead
datapoint.description: the pci device status as monitored by the remote access card; status codes are 1=other, 2=unknown, 3=ok, 4=non-critical, 5=critical, 6=non-recoverable
